import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import'./GroupDelete.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function GroupDelete(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{groupId}=useParams();const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[authError,setAuthError]=useState('');// 그룹 삭제 핸들러
const handleDeleteGroup=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch(`/api/groups/${groupId}`,{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){// 삭제 성공 시 메인 페이지로 이동
navigate('/');}else if(response.status===403){// 비밀번호 오류 처리
setAuthError('비밀번호가 일치하지 않습니다.');}else{// 기타 오류 처리
setAuthError(data.message||'그룹을 삭제하는 도중 문제가 발생했습니다.');}}catch(error){setAuthError('네트워크 오류가 발생했습니다.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"group-delete-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"group-delete-form",onSubmit:handleDeleteGroup,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"delete-title",children:"\uADF8\uB8F9 \uC0AD\uC81C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"\uC0AD\uC81C \uAD8C\uD55C \uC778\uC99D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638\uB97C \uC785\uB825\uD558\uC138\uC694",required:true}),authError&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-text",children:authError}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"delete-button",children:"\uC0AD\uC81C\uD558\uAE30"})]})});}export default GroupDelete;
